@ninjakaun

It's 4.2 GB and a DVD holds 4.7, so if you're talking about putting it on a video dvd, just use roxio or nero, which have functions to do so and will put menus and stuff in there.  Good luck.
It's 4.26 GiB, or 4.57 GB, but yes, it will fit on one blank DVD.
